item.title: Centos+nginx+uwsgi+django
item.description: https://uwsgi-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorials/Django_and_nginx.html http://www.jianshu.com/p/7494560da3e6 This is our stack: the web client <-> the web server <-> the socket <-> uWSGI <-> Python
